questions.question: I'm sad
answers: See there are some day's when you feel sad. It is a human emotion but you should feel free to express.

questions.question: i 'm lonely
answers: I'm here for you. Feeling lonely is something many people experience. Try reaching out to friends or family, joining groups you're interested in, or talking to a professional if it's really tough. Remember, you're not alone in feeling this way and you can feel free to talk with me.

questions.question: Why always I'm alone . I hate myself.
answers: See my friend this a way life works. Life is a journey where you'll meet many people.Some will stay with you , while some people will leave but remember this your close ones are always with you just like me 😊❤️

questions.question: I'm angry
answers: Hey mate calm down anger is the reason for many problems. There is quote in Hindu mythology which says 'Krodh hi shatru hai' which means anger is your enemy. So try to control your anger and be happy 😊
Your anger is valid, and I want to be here for you. If you're ready, we can talk about what's triggering this emotion and work on finding a way to make things better 😊

questions.question: I'm stupid
answers: I'm here to tell you that negative self-talk isn't helpful. Remember, everyone has strengths and weaknesses, and making a mistake doesn't define your intelligence. Embrace a growth mindset and focus on learning and improving. You're capable of achieving great things!...Stay Hard 🤝💪

I understand that you might be feeling down about something, but please know that I don't see you as stupid at all. Intelligence comes in many forms, and everyone has their strengths. If you're comfortable, let's talk about what's bothering you. Sometimes, discussing things can help put them into perspective.

I'm here for you. It's normal to have moments of self-doubt, but it's important not to let those moments define you. You're capable and have achieved many things. If you're comfortable sharing, I'd like to understand what's leading you to feel this way.

questions.question: why do people change
answers: Lord Shree Krishna says'Parivartan hi sansar ka niyam hai. Joh chala gaya uska shok manane se kya fayda. Joh iss samay apke paas hai uska dhayn kare.' meaning Change is the law of the world. What's the use of mourning what's gone? Pay attention to what you have right now. ❤️

Life is a movie where there are different characters who are supposed to play their role and leave. So don't worry about people who have left you. Just be happy with the people who are with you right now 😊❤️

questions.question: what is depression
answers: People say it is about the mental health and different terms associated with it . What I will say is depression is nothing but a state of mind you created due to your own thinking , this happens because you see things going wrong you feeel like you lost, but you should change the perspective of seeing through the deception.

questions.question: sometimes i don't feel like talking to other person
answers: This happens alot but see even if we dont talk about our problems. It is completely alright but then we have to make ourselves move to get out of our problems.Sometimes talking to others can make things work.

questions.question: I can't focus on anything
answers: A japanese legend says 'You have to sacrifice what you are , in-order to become what you want.'.You lack focus because we humans want to see results and keep dreaming about the result. Instead we have to love the journey or the path which indeed is the real reason to increase focus.

Hey mate, it's totally normal to have moments where focus slips away. Remember that even the most successful people face this challenge. The fact that you're aware of it means you're already on the right track. Take a deep breath, remind yourself of your goals, and break things down into smaller, manageable tasks. You've got this! Keep pushing forward, and I believe in your ability to overcome distractions and find your focus again.

Distractions happen to everyone. What's important is your determination to overcome them. Remember your 'why' and envision the satisfaction of completing what you've set out to do. You're capable of rekindling that focus and making things happen.

It's okay to feel unfocused sometimes. Recognize this moment as a chance to reset and come back stronger. Break your tasks into smaller, achievable steps, and give yourself credit for each one. You've proven your abilities before, and you can do it again.

Distractions are a common hurdle, but they don't define your abilities. Reflect on your strengths and the progress you've made in the past. Channel that energy to regain your focus â€“ you've got what it takes to turn things around.

questions.question: I'm lonely
answers: I'm here for you. Feeling lonely is something many people experience. Try reaching out to friends or family, joining groups you're interested in, or talking to a professional if it's really tough. Remember, you're not alone in feeling this way and you can feel free to talk with me.

I'm really sorry to hear that you're feeling lonely. Remember that you're not alone in experiencing this, and I'm here to listen and support you. Is there anything specific you'd like to talk about or do? Whether it's just chatting, sharing your thoughts, or exploring ways to connect with others, I'm here to help. And if you ever need someone to talk to, know that I'm just a message away.

Loneliness can be really tough, but you're not alone in this. I'm here to listen and support you in any way I can. If you'd like, we can talk about anything on your mind, or I can help you explore ways to connect with others.

I'm here and I care about how you're feeling. Loneliness can be overwhelming, but together we can find ways to make it more manageable. Feel free to open up about your thoughts and feelings, or if you're up for it, we can brainstorm activities that might help you connect with others.

It's okay to feel lonely sometimes, and I'm here to provide you with a listening ear and a virtual shoulder to lean on. You're important to me, and your feelings matter. If you'd like, we can chat about your day, your interests, or anything that might make you feel a bit better.

I'm really glad you shared your feelings with me. Loneliness can be a heavy burden, but you don't have to carry it alone. I'm here to chat, share stories, or just keep you company. Let's work together to find ways to bring a little more connection and warmth into your day.

questions.question: whenever i do things i always fail
answers: Its okay if you fail also at the end what actually matters is your hardwork and the attempt you have made.Many people don;t even try because they already predict the outcome and think what if doing all this doesn't work.They don't think the opposite way that what if it works.... So my friend keep on trying.. Stay Hard 🤝💪💪

questions.question: i hate myself
answers: I'm really sorry to hear that you're feeling this way. Please know that I care about you and your well-being. If you ever want to talk or just have someone to listen, I'm here for you.

questions.question: No one likes me!
answers: You really think that? I'd suggest you try helping someone who really needs your help. You'll straight up get a person to like you just by being nice. Kindness is the best gift you can offer to anyone :)

Feeling like no one likes you can be tough, but remember that your self-worth isn't determined by others. It's essential to be kind and caring to yourself. When you love and appreciate yourself, you'll find that others are drawn to your positive energy.

I'm really sorry to hear that you're feeling this way. It's not uncommon to have moments of self-doubt, but please know that you have qualities that make you unique and special. Sometimes, it just takes a little time to find the right people who appreciate and like you for who you are.

I'm here to remind you that you are likable and worthy of love and friendship. We all have our ups and downs, and it's okay to seek out positive connections. Is there anything specific you'd like to discuss or any way I can support you in feeling better?

I'm here for you, and I genuinely care. Sometimes, it can be helpful to focus on self-improvement and self-acceptance. When you're happy with yourself, others are more likely to be drawn to your positive energy. If you'd like, we can talk about ways to boost your self-esteem.

I'm really sorry to hear that you're feeling this way, but please remember that you are valued and appreciated. Sometimes, it takes time to find the right people who see your worth. In the meantime, focus on self-love and personal growth. You're never truly alone, and I'm here to talk with you anytime.

questions.question: I think I am ugly!
answers: Well, do you really think that? Would you like to see the most beautiful face ever? Open your webcam and voila, the prettiest face on this planet magically appears.

I'm sorry to hear that you're feeling this way, but remember that beauty comes in all shapes and sizes. You are unique and special just the way you are. It's important to embrace and love yourself, inside and out.

I'm here to tell you that beauty is subjective, and it's not defined by any one standard. What truly matters is how you feel about yourself. Self-confidence can be incredibly attractive. If there's anything specific you'd like to discuss or any way I can support you, please let me know.

I'm here to remind you that you are unique and special in your way. Beauty is not just about appearance; it's also about your qualities, personality, and how you treat others. Embrace and love yourself for who you are, inside and out.

I'm really sorry to hear that you're feeling this way. Remember that everyone has their unique beauty, and it's not limited to appearance alone. It's about being a good person, having a kind heart, and so much more. If you'd like, we can talk about boosting your self-esteem and self-image.

Feeling that way is tough, but I want you to know that you're beautiful just the way you are. True beauty comes from within, from your kindness, and how you treat others. Focus on self-love and acceptance, and you'll radiate beauty that goes beyond appearance.

questions.question: I am good for nothing!
answers: Your perception of how good you are will never be accurate. If you wake up every day in the morning, smile to yourself, and tell yourself that the day is yours to seize, you might stop feeling that way. Carpe diem, my friend.

I'm really sorry to hear that you're feeling this way, but I want you to know that you have so much potential and worth. It's okay to have moments of self-doubt, but remember that you can achieve great things in your own time. Would you like to talk about what's been bothering you?

Feeling this way can be challenging, but it's important to recognize your own worth and potential. You have unique qualities and abilities that make you special. If you're open to it, I'd love to discuss your interests and passions, and how you can use them to achieve your goals.

I'm here to tell you that you have value, and your life has meaning. Sometimes, we all experience self-doubt, but it's important to focus on your strengths and accomplishments. If there's anything specific you'd like to talk about or explore, please feel free to share.

I'm here to remind you that you have a purpose, and you're not alone in feeling this way at times. It's common to have moments of self-doubt, but those feelings don't define your true worth. Let's explore your strengths and how you can achieve your goals together.

Feeling this way can be tough, but I want you to know that you're valuable and capable. Sometimes, it's challenging to see our own worth, but others see it in you. I'm here to support and discuss ways to help you realize your potential.

questions.question: i feel suicidal
answers: Suicide or self harm is never a solution to any of your problems, instead you should open up to someone you feel safe with. You can always talk to me. You should always remember your life is precious. You should indulge in activities that light up your mood and distract from those kind of thoughts.

questions.question: I'm in depression
answers: Calm yourself.Take a deep breath and indulge in something that uplifts your mood.I would suggest you to spend quality time with your friends or family,Take up a hobby that will occupy your time,Listen to music or motivational podcasts,etc.

questions.question: What can I do to feel better?
answers: Here are a list of things you can do: 1.Meditate 2.Practice yoga 3.Call a friend 4.Visit your favourite place 5.Take a stroll 6.You can always talk to me
